name: data-agents
description: Sports event data extraction and management agents

scripts.prisma:generate:all: npm run prisma:generate:main && npm run prisma:generate:miles
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run prisma:generate:all
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run prisma:generate:all && turbo build --prod
scripts.clean: find packages apps -maxdepth 2 -type d -name dist -not -path '*/node_modules/*' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/database && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: cd packages/database && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:push: cd packages/database && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd packages/database && npx prisma db seed
